amuse.scheduler.gui.settings
Interface EditableAmuseSettingInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AmuseSettingsPageBody, BooleanSelectionPanel, CheckBoxTextField, EditableAmuseSettingBody, GeneralAmuseSettings, GridSettings, ListSelectionPanel, PathSelectionPanel, SliderIntSelectionPanel, TextFieldWithValidation
public interface EditableAmuseSettingInterface

This Interface is used for settings to be displayed and changeable within the AmuseWizard.

Author:
Clemens Waeltken
